sections.paragraph: + A descendant of Zerubbabel and son of Elioenai. (1 Chronicles 3:24) + One of the porters or doorkeepers at the east gate of the temple. (B.C. 636-440.) + One of the Nethinim, whole family returned with Zerubbabel. (Ezra 2:45) (B.C. 536.) + A Levite who assisted Ezra in expounding the law to the people. (Nehemiah 8:7)
